items.title: Hurricane Melissa hits Cuba after turning Jamaica into ‘disaster area’

• The category 5 cyclonic storm ripped through the westernmost parts of the island, ripping roofs from buildings and flipping over cars
• Hurricane is one of the strongest Atlantic hurricanes observed since record-keeping began
• Climate scientists say human-caused global heating has contributed to the rapid intensification of modern storms

• The likelihood of a tropical cyclone becoming a major hurricane increased by 5 percent per decade from 1979 to 2017

• Experts say the sudden loss of that income will mean SNAP recipients have less money to spend in Texas grocery stores
